title: Bangladesh likely to keep power deal with Adani: Report
description: Bangladesh will likely keep a power purchase deal with India's Adani Power despite high costs and legal challenges. A new government panel is reviewing previous contracts. Adani supplies significant power to Dhaka, despite mounting unpaid dues. The interim government is also scrapping other projects, indicating further possible cancellations.
